BodyName: Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections

Items.Title: Communication from the Mayor - Submitting the name of Lauvienska Polanco to the Council for its advice and consent regarding her reappointment to the Taxi and Limousine Commission, Pursuant to Sections 31 and 2301 of the City Charter.

Items.Title: Communication from the New York County Democratic Committee - Submitting for the Advice & Consent of the Council, the name of Gregory C. Soumas, for appointment as the New York County Democratic Commissioner of Elections, pursuant to Section 3 – 204 (2) of the Election Law.
